author: TED ANTHONY AP National Writer
title: Virus-era decisions: Way too many, and each with high stakes
description: The notion of decision fatigue has been around for a long time — long before the virus came
content:
Should you wash your hands?
Are you going out to get the mail? Should you touch the mailbox? Should you touch the mail? Should you clean the mail?
Should you take a walk? Should you wear a mask? What about gloves? What about neighbors stay six feet away? Te… [+5711 chars]
